sentences.en: Ceramics Tiles Floor Marble, Granite Slate , Quarizite Onyx, Teak Parquet.
sentences.cn: 各种款式地砖,磁砖,各国大理石, 花岗石, 板石.泰国柚木地板.

sentences.en: Combination of wooden parquet flooring, floor to make personalized home.
sentences.cn: 组合小木拼花地板, 使家居地板个性化.

sentences.en: Company of the parquet floor with professional designers, specializing in the parquet, antique, composite floor development.
sentences.cn: 公司具有专业的拼花地板设计人员, 专业从事拼花 、 仿古 、 复合地板的开发.

sentences.en: He slipped as he tried to waltz on the parquet floor.
sentences.cn: 他想在镶木地板上旋几个舞步,滑倒了.

sentences.en: I like to dance on the parquet, too, not only on the ice.
sentences.cn: 不只在冰上,我也喜欢在地板上跳舞.

sentences.en: Importer , Exporter & Manufacturer of Burma Teak Parquet & Strip Flooring Timber , Teak logs.
sentences.cn: 缅甸柚木桐,板.制造供应:上等柚木地板, 锯板.

sentences.en: Labels, household goods, thick film , automotive parts, motorcycle parts, no - wax floors , parquet, laminate flooring, furniture section.
sentences.cn: 标签 、 家用品 、 厚膜 、 汽车部件 、 摩托车部件 、 无蜡不天板、镶木不天板 、 条木不天板 、 家具.

sentences.en: On the ice or on the parquet?
The hall floor is laid with wooden blocks similar to parquet.
sentences.cn: 礼堂的地板用类似镶木地板的木块铺设着.

sentences.en: The parquet floor is infinitely preferable to carpets.
sentences.cn: 木地板比地毯不知好多少倍.

sentences.en: The parquet floors shone like mirrors.

trans.tran_cn: 镶木地板，<美>（剧场的）正厅后排，（法）检查机关
trans.tran_en: small flat blocks of wood fitted together in a pattern that cover the floor of a room
